name: Legend of Sell-da
description:
Legend of Sell-da takes the player behind the scenes of our favourite Hero's, Princess', and False King's (unnamed for copyright-reasons)journey through Hyrule. We often times forget the importance of the people in the background of our epic tales, but equally often they are the ones who grant us the chances to defeat our foes. This time you get to be one of those people!

Your experience will start with Hyrule's most famous beetle-enthusiast entrusting you with his shop for the next three days. Meet your customers, sell your wares, and have the chance to be a part of something greater.

Merchant's Letter: Hi kid! I’m so grateful you agreed to take care of the shop while I go out on my annual Beetle-hunting trip. Wish me luck! Remember, that as a shopkeeper you have many responsibilities, the most obvious of which is to make money, but it is equally important to remember to sell your customers the items that will help them the most… or even if not them, the world itself. Good luck!

The game was made during the Aalto Orientation Week Game Jam, with four students and one graduate of the Game Design and Development department.

How to Play:
  • Press the "E" key to Continue.
  • Click and drag the items to their correct placements (green is cheapest, blue is slightly more expensive, and red is the most expensive).
Creators:
  • Narrative & Game Design - Jintastic
  • Lead Programmer - Prabby_Patty
  • Programmer & Sound Designer - A57R4L
  • 3D Artist & Character Design - v4v3
  • 3D Artist & Item Design - lilacola
